body:
jQuery UI Dialog Titlebar Help button Plugin ====================== is a plug-in to add a Help button in the title bar of the dialog. Sample Code ---------- ``` html Dialog Open
dialog

contents
``` Option ---------- + `help` : Sets the url of the Help page. Unset does not display the button. + `helpTitle` : help page window title. License ---------- Copyright © 2012 MiYABiS Distributed under the [MIT License][mit]. [MIT]: http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php
name: Jquery.dialog.helpbutton
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: jQuery UI Dialog Titlebar Help button Plugin
